# didPlayToEndTimeNotification

**Type Property**

A notification the system posts when a player item plays to its end time.

## Declaration

```swift
class let didPlayToEndTimeNotification: NSNotification.Name
```

## Discussion

The notification’s object is the item that finished playing.



## Observing notifications

- **failedToPlayToEndTimeNotification**: A notification that the system posts when a player item fails to play to its end time.
- **timeJumpedNotification**: A notification the system posts when a player item’s time changes discontinuously.
- **playbackStalledNotification**: A notification the system posts when a player item media doesn’t arrive in time to continue playback.
- **mediaSelectionDidChangeNotification**: A notification the player item posts when its media selection changes.
- **recommendedTimeOffsetFromLiveDidChangeNotification**: A notification the player item posts when its offset from the live time changes.
- **newAccessLogEntryNotification**: A notification the system posts when a player item adds a new entry to its access log.
- **newErrorLogEntryNotification**: A notification the system posts when a player item adds a new entry to its error log.
